location.en: Huaiyang County, Zhoukou City, Henan Province

description.zh-cn: 中国从先秦到汉朝时期的一古地名，曾是东周陈国和秦末张楚国的首都。新朝时期改称陈陵县。
description.en: An ancient place name in China from the pre-Qin period to the Han Dynasty, which served as the capital of the State of Chen during the Eastern Zhou Dynasty and the Zhangchu regime at the end of the Qin Dynasty. It was renamed Chenling County during the Xin Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 东亚国家，是世界上历史最悠久的国家之一。
description.en: A country in East Asia, one of the world's oldest continuous civilizations.

description.zh-cn: 指秦朝建立之前的历史时代。
description.en: Refers to the historical era before the establishment of the Qin Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 周朝时期的诸侯国，以陈县为首都。
description.en: A vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty, with Chen County as its capital.

description.zh-cn: 由陈胜在秦朝末年建立的农民起义政权，意为“张大楚国”，以陈县为首都。
description.en: A rebel state established by Chen Sheng at the end of the Qin Dynasty, meaning 'Great Chu', with Chen County as its capital.

description.zh-cn: 由陈胜、吴广领导的中国历史上第一次大规模的农民起义，揭开了秦末民变的序幕。
description.en: The first large-scale peasant uprising in Chinese history, led by Chen Sheng and Wu Guang, which marked the beginning of the rebellions at the end of the Qin dynasty.

en: Uprisings at the end of the Qin dynasty

description.zh-cn: 秦朝末年农民起义的领袖之一，与吴广一同发动大泽乡起义，后建立张楚政权并自立为王。
description.en: One of the leaders of the peasant uprising at the end of the Qin Dynasty, who launched the Dazexiang Uprising with Wu Guang and later established the Zhangchu regime, declaring himself king.

description.zh-cn: 秦朝末年农民起义的领袖之一，与陈胜一同发动大泽乡起义。
description.en: One of the leaders of the peasant uprising at the end of the Qin Dynasty, who launched the Dazexiang Uprising with Chen Sheng.

description.zh-cn: 陈胜麾下的将军，曾率军西击秦朝，一度逼近咸阳。
description.en: A general under Chen Sheng who led an army to attack the Qin dynasty from the west, once approaching the capital Xianyang.

description.zh-cn: 秦朝的第二位皇帝。
description.en: The second emperor of the Qin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 秦朝末年的将领，受命于秦二世，率军镇压陈胜、吴广的起义。
description.en: A general at the end of the Qin Dynasty, who was ordered by Qin Er Shi to lead an army to suppress the uprising of Chen Sheng and Wu Guang.

description.zh-cn: 吴广的部将，后杀害吴广。
description.en: A subordinate general of Wu Guang, who later killed him.

description.zh-cn: 陈胜的车夫，后将其杀害。
description.en: Chen Sheng's charioteer, who later assassinated him.

description.zh-cn: 陈胜的部下，在陈胜死后组织“苍头军”重夺陈县，为陈胜报仇。
description.en: A subordinate of Chen Sheng who, after Chen's death, organized the 'Cangtou Army' to recapture Chen County and avenge Chen Sheng.

description.zh-cn: 由吕臣在安徽地区组织的军队。
description.en: An army organized by Lü Chen in the Anhui region.

description.zh-cn: 原楚国贵族，被吕臣拥立为王，重建张楚政权。
description.en: A former noble of the State of Chu, who was installed as king by Lü Chen to re-establish the Zhangchu regime.

description.zh-cn: 秦末起义军领袖之一，项羽的叔父。
description.en: One of the leaders of the anti-Qin rebellion, and the uncle of Xiang Yu.

description.zh-cn: 楚怀王之孙，被项梁拥立为王，史称楚后怀王。
description.en: Grandson of King Huai of Chu, installed as king by Xiang Liang, known posthumously as Emperor Yi of Chu.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝的开国皇帝。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 秦末时期的军事领袖，西楚霸王。
description.en: A military leader in the late Qin dynasty, Hegemon-King of Western Chu.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝开国功臣之一。
description.en: One of the founding fathers of the Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 汉高祖十一年所设置的诸侯国。
description.en: A vassal kingdom established in the eleventh year of Emperor Gaozu of Han's reign.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝的监察区之一。
description.en: One of the inspectorate regions of the Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 陈国以陈县为其首都。
description.en: The State of Chen used Chen County as its capital.

description.zh-cn: 张楚国以陈县为其首都。
description.en: The Zhangchu regime used Chen County as its capital.

description.zh-cn: 与吴广共同号召并领导了大泽乡起义。
description.en: Co-initiated and led the Dazexiang Uprising with Wu Guang.

description.zh-cn: 与陈胜共同号召并领导了大泽乡起义。
description.en: Co-initiated and led the Dazexiang Uprising with Chen Sheng.

description.zh-cn: 共同领导大泽乡起义的伙伴。
description.en: Partners who jointly led the Dazexiang Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 在占领陈县后自立为王，国号张楚。
description.en: After capturing Chen County, he declared himself king and named his state Zhangchu.

description.zh-cn: 陈胜以吴广率重兵进攻荥阳。
description.en: Chen Sheng ordered Wu Guang to lead a large force to attack Xingyang.

description.zh-cn: 陈胜以周文为将军，率部由陈县出发西击秦。
description.en: Chen Sheng appointed Zhou Wen as a general to lead troops from Chen County to attack Qin in the west.

description.zh-cn: 受秦二世急令，率军迎击周文军。
description.en: Under urgent orders from Qin Er Shi, he led an army to counter Zhou Wen's forces.

description.zh-cn: 率领秦军击败了周文的军队，导致周文兵败自杀。
description.en: Led the Qin army to defeat Zhou Wen's forces, leading to Zhou Wen's defeat and suicide.

description.zh-cn: 作为吴广的部将，将其杀害。
description.en: As Wu Guang's subordinate general, he killed him.

description.zh-cn: 率军攻来，田臧兵败被杀。
description.en: Led his army to attack, resulting in Tian Zang's defeat and death.

description.zh-cn: 率军进攻陈县，击败陈胜。
description.en: Led his army to attack Chen County and defeated Chen Sheng.

description.zh-cn: 作为陈胜的车夫，在陈胜败退时将其杀害。
description.en: As Chen Sheng's charioteer, he assassinated him during the retreat.

description.zh-cn: 在安徽地区组织了“苍头军”。
description.en: Organized the 'Cangtou Army' in the Anhui region.

description.zh-cn: 重夺陈县后，处死庄贾为陈胜报仇。
description.en: After recapturing Chen County, he executed Zhuang Jia to avenge Chen Sheng.

description.zh-cn: 拥立景驹为王，重新建立张楚政权。
description.en: Enthroned Jing Ju as king to re-establish the Zhangchu regime.

description.zh-cn: 拥立楚怀王之孙熊心为王。
description.en: Enthroned Xiong Xin, the grandson of King Huai of Chu, as the new king.

description.zh-cn: 在项梁拥立熊心为王后，吕臣立即投奔。
description.en: After Xiang Liang installed Xiong Xin as king, Lü Chen immediately joined his forces.

description.zh-cn: 吕臣投奔项梁后，张楚政权并入西楚。
description.en: After Lü Chen joined Xiang Liang, the Zhangchu regime was merged into Western Chu.

description.zh-cn: 率领汉军在陈县追击项羽，并大破楚军。
description.en: Led the Han army to pursue Xiang Yu to Chen County and defeated the Chu army.

description.zh-cn: 在陈县与汉高祖刘邦会合，共同包围项羽。
description.en: Joined forces with Emperor Gaozu of Han (Liu Bang) at Chen County to encircle Xiang Yu.

description.zh-cn: 陈县为淮阳国的属县。
description.en: Chen County was a subordinate county of the Huaiyang Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 淮阳国属兖州刺史部管辖。
description.en: The Huaiyang Kingdom was under the jurisdiction of the Yan Province Inspectorate.

description.zh-cn: 新朝时期，陈县改称为陈陵县。
description.en: During the Xin Dynasty, Chen County was renamed Chenling County.
